pullRequest.title: [BC-203] Drop pending blocks from finalized slots
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Add a FinalizedCheckpointEvent to signal that a new block has been finalized.  Use this event to update constraints on PendingBlocks, so we can drop blocks that are from a finalized slot.

commit.message: Drop pending blocks from finalized slots

nodes.bodyText: Isn't this check redundant? How can a block be in the historical limit but not before a finalized slot?
